title: Update Dave Clarke event data to match verified RA listings

quotes: Fri, 6 Mar - TBA (or Industrial 236 Warehouse / Vantek Warehouse) - Vancouver
Sat, 7 Mar - 821 Runnymede Rd (or 131 McCormack St) - Toronto
Fri, 13 Mar - TBA - East (likely Nancy, France; event: WONDER RAVE)
Sat, 14 Mar - Mia Mao - Paris (OFF THE GRID: Elli Acula, RISA TANAGUSHI, Dave Clarke)
Fri, 15 May - Concorde 2 - Brighton (City Wall x Dave Clarke)
Fri, 10 Jul - Klein Strand - Ostend / Belgium (Ostend Beach Festival 2026; multi-day fest)
Fri, 24 Jul - District Cardiff - Cardiff (Luvmuzik presents Dave Clarke & Gary Beck)
Thu, 12 Aug 2027 - Hellissandur - Iceland (Iceland Eclipse; note: this is 2027, but included as it's listed in your data)

acceptanceCriteria: Dave Clarke's Vancouver event venue reads 'TBA (Industrial 236 Warehouse / Vantek Warehouse)' in the backend and is displayed correctly on the frontend.
Dave Clarke's Toronto event venue reads '821 Runnymede Rd (or 131 McCormack St)' in the backend.
Dave Clarke's Nancy event has eventTitle 'WONDER RAVE' and venue 'TBA East'.
Dave Clarke's Paris event has eventTitle 'OFF THE GRID: Elli Acula, RISA TANAGUSHI, Dave Clarke' and venue 'Mia Mao'.
Dave Clarke's London fabric event dateTime is '2026-04-04T22:00:00Z'.
Dave Clarke's Brighton event dateTime is '2026-05-15T22:00:00Z' and venue is 'Concorde 2'.
Dave Clarke's Ostend event dateTime is '2026-07-10T18:00:00Z' and venue is 'Klein Strand'.
Dave Clarke's Cardiff event dateTime is '2026-07-24T22:00:00Z' and venue is 'District Cardiff'.
Dave Clarke's Iceland event dateTime is '2027-08-12T20:00:00Z' and venue is 'Hellissandur'.
`getEventsByArtist` queried with Dave Clarke's artist ID returns exactly 9 events with the correct fields.
All other artists' event datasets are unaffected by this change.
The canister builds and deploys without errors; `postupgrade` calls `initializeSeedData` unconditionally.

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts`, update any entries for Dave Clarke's 9 events to match the corrected venue strings and dateTimes introduced in REQ-106. Specifically: (1) update the entry for the Vancouver event to reflect venue 'TBA (Industrial 236 Warehouse / Vantek Warehouse)' and dateTime '2026-03-06T22:00:00Z'; (2) update the entry for the Toronto event to reflect venue '821 Runnymede Rd (or 131 McCormack St)' and dateTime '2026-03-07T22:00:00Z'; (3) update the entry for the Brighton Concorde 2 event to dateTime '2026-05-15T22:00:00Z'; (4) update the entry for the Cardiff District Cardiff event to dateTime '2026-07-24T22:00:00Z'. Any existing entries whose composite keys no longer correspond to a live backend event ID (due to venue or dateTime changes) must be removed or updated so that the Add to Radar functionality continues to work correctly using the exact backend event IDs.

quotes: Fri, 6 Mar - TBA (or Industrial 236 Warehouse / Vantek Warehouse) - Vancouver
Sat, 7 Mar - 821 Runnymede Rd (or 131 McCormack St) - Toronto
Fri, 15 May - Concorde 2 - Brighton (City Wall x Dave Clarke)
Fri, 24 Jul - District Cardiff - Cardiff (Luvmuzik presents Dave Clarke & Gary Beck)

acceptanceCriteria: The eventIdLookup table contains up-to-date composite keys matching the corrected dateTimes and venues for all 9 Dave Clarke events.
No stale lookup entries remain for Dave Clarke events that have had their dateTime or venue changed.
The Add to Radar button on Dave Clarke event cards correctly resolves to valid backend event IDs after the update.
All other entries in eventIdLookup.ts are unaffected.

constraints: Do not modify event data for any artist other than Dave Clarke in the backend.
The `postupgrade` system hook must continue to call `initializeSeedData` unconditionally.
The stable `radarEvents` HashMap must not be wiped or overwritten during `initializeSeedData`.
Do not edit files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new artists or events beyond the Dave Clarke corrections requested.
Changing Jeff Mills, Richie Hawtin, Joey Beltram, Derrick May, Juan Atkins, Kevin Saunderson, or Robert Hood event data.
Modifying the Skyscanner or Booking.com deep-link logic (no new cities introduced by these corrections).
